awspricingfull module¶

AWS Instances (EC2, ElastiCachep, RDS, Redshift) pricing retrieval project.

Project contains one module which is designed to retrieve the AWS prices for four major AWS services that have reserved instances involved: EC2, ElastiCache, RDS and Redshift. The prices either On-Demand or Reserved (specified by user) can be retrieved to Command Line in JSON, Table (Prettytable) or CSV formats. CSV format option also saves the csv file to the folder specified by user, which is the main use case. The undocumented AWS pricing APIa are used as the sources. The same APIs serve the data to the AWS pricing pages. Both current and previous generation instance prices are retrieved.

Created on 25 March 2015 @author: Ilia Semenov

class awspricingfull.AWSPrices¶

Bases: object

Abstract class - base for the pricing retrieval classes for different services.

DEFAULT_CURRENCY¶

str

USD Currency used in every AWS pricing by default.

REGIONS¶

list of str

List of AWS regions.

JSON_NAME_TO_REGIONS_API¶

dict of str: str

Mapping of some internal AWS region names used in few sources to the conventional ones.

DEFAULT_CURRENCY = 'USD'
JSON_NAME_TO_REGIONS_API = {'apac-sin': 'ap-southeast-1', 'us-west': 'us-west-1', 'us-east-1': 'us-east-1', 'ap-northeast-1': 'ap-northeast-1', 'sa-east-1': 'sa-east-1', 'eu-frankfurt': 'eu-central-1', 'apac-syd': 'ap-southeast-2', 'eu-ireland': 'eu-west-1', 'ap-southeast-1': 'ap-southeast-1', 'us-east': 'us-east-1', 'ap-southeast-2': 'ap-southeast-2', 'us-west-2': 'us-west-2', 'apac-tokyo': 'ap-northeast-1', 'us-gov-west-1': 'us-gov-west-1', 'us-west-1': 'us-west-1', 'eu-central-1': 'eu-central-1', 'eu-west-1': 'eu-west-1'}
REGIONS = ['us-east-1', 'us-west-1', 'us-west-2', 'eu-west-1', 'ap-southeast-1', 'ap-southeast-2', 'ap-northeast-1', 'sa-east-1', 'eu-central-1', 'us-gov-west-1']
get_ondemand_instances_prices()¶
Abstract method for getting On-Demand pricing.
Implemented in child classes.
Raises:NotImplementedError – Abstract method is not implemented.
get_reserved_instances_prices()¶
Abstract method for getting Reserved pricing.
Implemented in child classes.
Raises:NotImplementedError – Abstract method is not implemented.
load_data(url)¶

Method for retrieving the pricing data in a clean dictionary format.

Parameters:url – The pricing source url.
Returns:data – Pricing data in a dictionary format
Return type:dict of dict: dict
none_as_string(v)¶

Method for returning a blank string instead of None.

Parameters:v – The value to be checked for None.
Returns:v or “” is v is None.
print_json(u)¶

Method printing the pricing data in JSON format to Console.

Parameters:u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
Prints:
Pricing data in JSON string format or an error message.
class awspricingfull.AllAWSPrices¶

Bases: awspricingfull.AWSPrices

Class for retrieving the instance pricing for 4 AWS Services:
EC2, RDS, ElastiCache and Redshift. Child of awspricingfull.AWSPrices class.
ec2¶

EC2Prices

instance of awspricingfull.EC2Prices class containing methods for EC2 pricing retrieval.

elc¶

ELCPrices

instance of awspricingfull.ELCPrices class containing methods for ElastiCache pricing retrieval.

rds¶

RDSPrices

instance of awspricingfull.RDSPrices class containing methods for RDS pricing retrieval.

rs¶

RSPrices

instance of awspricingfull.RSPrices class containing methods for Redshift pricing retrieval.

ec2 = <awspricingfull.EC2Prices object at 0x0000000003FCCF98>
elc = <awspricingfull.ELCPrices object at 0x0000000003C205F8>
print_json(u)¶

Method printing the pricing data in JSON format to Console.

Parameters:u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”), Reserved (“reserved”) or both (“all”) pricing option.
Prints:
Pricing data in JSON string format or an error message.
rds = <awspricingfull.RDSPrices object at 0x0000000003C20208>
rs = <awspricingfull.RSPrices object at 0x0000000003C205C0>
save_csv(u, path='C:\\Users\\isemenov\\workspace\\awspricingfull\\docs\\', name=None)¶
Method saving the full pricing data in CSV format to the
cpecified location.
Parameters:
  • u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”), Reserved (“reserved”) or both (“all”) pricing option.
  • path (str) – System path for saving the data file. Current directory is the the defauilt value.
  • name (str) – The desired name of the file. The default values are “FULL_reserved_pricing.csv” for Reserved, “FULL_ondemand_pricing.csv” for On-Demand and “FULL_all_pricing.csv” for both.
Prints:
Full pricing in the CSV format (console).

Return type:result

Implementation of method for getting EC2 Reserved pricing.

print_table(u)¶
Method printing the EC2 pricing data to the console
in the Pretty Table format (requires Pretty Table import).
Parameters:u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
Prints:
EC2 pricing in the Pretty Table format.
save_csv(u, path='C:\\Users\\isemenov\\workspace\\awspricingfull\\docs\\', name=None)¶
Method saving the EC2 pricing data in CSV format to the
cpecified location.
Parameters:
  • u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
  • path (str) – System path for saving the data file. Current directory is the the defauilt value.
  • name (str) – The desired name of the file. The default values are “EC2_reserved_pricing.csv” for Reserved and “EC2_ondemand_pricing.csv” for On-Demand.
Prints:
EC2 pricing in the CSV format (console).

dict of str: str

get_ondemand_instances_prices()¶

Implementation of method for getting RDS On-Denand pricing.

Returns:RDS On-Denand pricing in dictionary format.
Return type:result
get_reserved_instances_prices()¶

Implementation of method for getting RDS Reserved pricing.

Returns:RDS Reserved pricing in dictionary format.
Return type:result
print_table(u)¶
Method printing the RDS pricing data to the console
in the Pretty Table format (requires Pretty Table import).
Parameters:u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
Prints:
RDS pricing in the Pretty Table format.
save_csv(u, path='C:\\Users\\isemenov\\workspace\\awspricingfull\\docs\\', name=None)¶
Method saving the RDS pricing data in CSV format to the
cpecified location.
Parameters:
  • u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
  • path (str) – System path for saving the data file. Current directory is the the defauilt value.
  • name (str) – The desired name of the file. The default values are “RDS_reserved_pricing.csv” for Reserved and “RDS_ondemand_pricing.csv” for On-Demand.
Prints:
RDS pricing in the CSV format (console).
class awspricingfull.RSPrices¶

Bases: awspricingfull.AWSPrices

Class for retrieving the Redshift pricing. Child of awspricingfull.AWSPrices class.

RS_ON_DEMAND_URL¶

str

Undocumented AWS Pricing API URL - On-Demand Redshift Nodes

PG_RS_ON_DEMAND_URL¶

str

Undocumented AWS Pricing API URL - Reserved Redshift Nodes, Previous Generation

RS_RESERVED_URL¶

str

Undocumented AWS Pricing API URL - Reserved Redshift Nodes, Previous Generation

PG_RS_ON_DEMAND_URL = 'http://a0.awsstatic.com/pricing/1/redshift/previous-generation/pricing-on-demand-redshift-instances.min.js'
PG_RS_RESERVED_URL = 'http://a0.awsstatic.com/pricing/1/redshift/previous-generation/pricing-reserved-redshift-instances.min.js'¶
RS_ON_DEMAND_URL = 'http://a0.awsstatic.com/pricing/1/redshift/pricing-on-demand-redshift-instances.min.js'
RS_RESERVED_URL = 'http://a0.awsstatic.com/pricing/1/redshift/pricing-reserved-redshift-instances.min.js'

Implementation of method for getting Redshift Reserved pricing.

Returns:Redshift Reserved pricing in dictionary format.
Return type:result

Method printing the Redshift pricing data to the console
in the Pretty Table format (requires Pretty Table import).
Parameters:u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
Prints:
Redshift pricing in the Pretty Table format.
save_csv(u, path='C:\\Users\\isemenov\\workspace\\awspricingfull\\docs\\', name=None)¶
Method saving the Redshift pricing data in CSV format to the
cpecified location.
Parameters:
  • u (str) – Parameter specifying On-Demand (“ondemand”) or Reserved (“reserved”) pricing option.
  • path (str) – System path for saving the data file. Current directory is the the defauilt value.
  • name (str) – The desired name of the file. The default values are “Redshift_reserved_pricing.csv” for Reserved and “Redshift_ondemand_pricing.csv” for On-Demand.
Prints:
Redshift pricing in the CSV format (console).
